title: SHOW RELEASE DIRECTIVES command: new columns | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2023_08 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The output of the SHOW RELEASE DIRECTIVES command behaves as follows:

The output of this command does not include the ACTIVE_REGIONS, PENDING_REGIONS, RELEASE_STATUS,
and DEPLOYED_ON columns.

The output of this command includes the ACTIVE_REGIONS, PENDING_REGIONS, RELEASE_STATUS, and
DEPLOYED_ON columns, which are defined as follows:
Displays a list of Snowflake regions where the Snowflake Native App has been successfully deployed.
Displays a list of Snowflake regions where the Snowflake Native App is scheduled to be deployed.
Displays the current status of the release. Possible values are:
Displays the date and time when the application was installed or upgraded.
